Function Documentation

plFloat plPhi ( plFloat  x)
inline

This function implements the Phi function.

Phi is the cumulative (repartition) function of the standard normal (Gaussian) distribution: Phi(x) = 0.5 + 0.5 * erf( x/sqrt(2) )

References plErf().

Referenced by plStatFunctions::phi().
